  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:ait.opetaja.ee:ba9764d000c9a72d27d819636f18b08890b6b217</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>1</catalog>
            <entry>ba9764d000c9a72d27d819636f18b08890b6b217</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="et">Sulghäälikute õigekiri; arvuti kasutamine, 2. klassile</string>
            <string language="en">stop</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anschlag</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">arrêt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">batente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arresto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στάση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">parada</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Õpetaja tunnikava koos töölehega I kooliastme 2. klassile. Kinnistada sulghäälikute õigekirja. Elektrooniline tööleht: harjutada arvutil trükkimist, õppida muutma kirja suurust ja värvi.</string>
            <string language="en">Teacher lesson plan with a worksheet for the 1st stage of study, form 2. Revision of spelling of explosives. Electronic worksheet: practice printing, learn to change text size and colour.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Algõpetus</string>
            <string language="et">Eesti keel</string>
            <string language="et">õigekiri</string>
            <string language="et">sulghäälikud</string>
            <string language="en">Basic School</string>
            <string language="en">Estonian language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrerlektionplan mit einem Bogen für das 1. 
Stadium der Studie, Formular 2. Änderung der Rechtschreibung 
der Explosivstoffe. Elektronischer Bogen: üben Sie zu 
drucken, erlernen Sie, Textgröße und -farbe zu ändern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon de professeur avec un tableau pour
la 1ère étape de l'étude, forme 2. Révision de l'épellation
des explosifs. Tableau électronique : pratiquez imprimer,
apprenez à changer la taille et la couleur des textes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição do professor com uma folha para
o 1o estágio do estudo, formulário 2. Revisão da soletração
dos explosivos. Folha eletrônica: pratique imprimir, 
aprenda mudar o tamanho e a cor do texto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione dell'insegnante con un 
foglio di lavoro per la prima fase dello studio, forma 2. 
Revisione di ortografia degli esplosivi. Foglio di lavoro 
elettronico: esercitisi in stampare, impari cambiare il formato 
ed il colore del testo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο μαθήματος δασκάλων με ένα φύλλο εργασίας 
για το 1$ο στάδιο της μελέτης, διαμορφώνει την αναθεώρηση 2. της 
ορθογραφίας των εκρηκτικών υλών. Ηλεκτρονικό φύλλο 
εργασίας: η εκτύπωση πρακτικής, μαθαίνει να αλλάζει το 
μέγεθος και το χρώμα κειμένων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plan de la lección del profesor con una hoja de 
trabajo para la 1ra etapa del estudio, forma 2. Revisión del 
deletreo de explosivos. Hoja de trabajo electrónica: 
practique el imprimir, aprenda cambiar talla y color del texto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Schule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Estnische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">École de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage estonien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escola Básica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua estonian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scuola Di base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua estone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασικό σχολείο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εσθονική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escuela Básica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lenguaje estonio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
